subsection_analysis.refined_text:
When you create a different form, redo this 
task to enable Acrobat Reader users to use the tools.

Interactive  form  
To create an interactive form , use the Prepare  Forms  tool.

Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat  Pro)  
You can change a flat form to a fillable form by either using the  Prepare  Form  tool or 
enabling the  Fill & Sign  tools.
Shared web forms can be viewed on the Manage page, but do not allow editing.

• Download  Individu al Files  - Provides the option to download the individual PDF files 
if multiple files were used to create the web form.

• Activity  for the Bulk Send parent template (orange square) - The Activity  > link at the 
bottom of the context panel opens a chronological list of the enablement actions 
taken against the (parent) Bu lk Send template (eg:  Creation , Completed  events).

Or, select the hamburger menu   (Windows) or 
the File menu (macOS)   > Create  and then select the 
appropriate file type and follow through the steps.

You can create PDFs from documents printed on paper, Microsoft Word documents, InDesign® 
files, digital images, and more.

If the balance between the file size and th e quality is critical to your task, you must use an 
appropriate conversion method.

PDF/A  Compliance 
Creates the PDF so that it c onforms to the selected ISO standard for long -term preservation of 
electronic documents.

These conversion settings apply to all Acrobat features that 
create PDFs, such as Acrobat Distiller, PDFMaker, and the Acrobat application itself.

Security tab of the Adobe PDFMaker preferences  
The settings available for PDFMaker depend on the application in which you’re using 
PDFMaker.

Generative AI features  cannot  replace  
advice  provided by a qualified  professional and do not form  any such  relationship  (for 
example,  an attorney- client  relationship).

- Enhanced productivity : Work across multiple PDFs and documents in various formats, 
including Teams and Zoom meeting transcripts, streamlining your workflow and 
saving time for higher -priority tasks.

AI Assistant is also available on phones through Acrobat mobile 
apps (iOS and Android).
